CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 20, 1957, pg. A9, reads: "'Cotton Queen' - Charming Phyllis Ball, sweetheart of Omicron Chapter of Alpha Phi Alpha, was crowned the 1957 'Queen of Cotton' by Arnold Sowell, track star at the university of Pittsburgh. The dance, given by Iota Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha, was held at the Hotel Fort Pitt.  The AKAs will also present the Cotillion, May 18. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Arnold "Arnie" Sowell, placing crown on head of "Queen of Cotton" Phyllis Ball, in front of Rookwood mural in Norse Room of Fort Pitt Hotel for Alpha Kappa Alpha dance
